definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The finest edge is made with the blunt whetstone. JOHN LYL.
sentences.chinese: 最銳利的鋒刃是從粗糙的磨刀石上磨出來的。

sentences.english: A knife is sharpened on the grindstone; steel is tempered in fire.
sentences.chinese: 刀在磨刀石上可以磨尖，鋼鐵是在火中練就的。

sentences.english: Sharpening Stones and Weightstones now last 1hour.
sentences.chinese: 磨刀石和平衡石的效果現在持續一小時。

sentences.english: The queen replied that she would apply it to the edges of her soldiers' swords.
sentences.chinese: 瑪格麗特回答說，她會用那磨刀石磨利將士劍鋒。

sentences.english: Thefinest edge is made withtheblunt whetstone.
sentences.chinese: 是磨刀石上鐮刀的霍霍聲。

sentences.english: The water keeps the metal particles from becoming embedded in the stone and glazing its surface.
sentences.chinese: 水可以阻止金屬粒子滲入磨刀石並在上面形成金屬層。

sentences.english: The finest edge in made with the rough blunt whetstone.
sentences.chinese: 最銳利的鋒刃是在粗糙的磨刀石上磨出來的。

sentences.english: A sharpening stone and honing guide are required for this task.
sentences.chinese: 磨刀石和導向器就是爲了完成這項工作。

sentences.english: This is an opportunity to hone your participation in a variety of ways.
sentences.chinese: 這對磨刀石是一個機會你多種方法的參與。

sentences.english: Take the sickle which is lying on the grindstone.
sentences.chinese: 把磨刀石上的那把鐮刀拿去。

sentences.english: I never mind your kind reminding me that the grindstone hinders you.
sentences.chinese: 我決不介意你的好意提醒我說磨刀石妨礙了你。

definition: to quench/to temper/to harden by quenching
to edge a knife, scissor, sword etc
to sharpen on grindstone/to improve oneself by practice
